posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following ungraded T-205 cards. The cards are as follows:

The following is available for sale for $30 [plus shipping - see below]

Edward Phelps [SOLD]

The following cards are available for sale for $50 each [plus shipping - see below]

A. Latham [SOLD]
Lawrence Doyle [SOLD]
Thomas Needham [SOLD]
G.N. Rucker [SOLD]

The following cards are available for sale for $50 each [plus shipping - see below]

Harry Wolter
John Lobert
Robert Groom
Edward Barger (Full "B")
Harry Gaspar
W.R. Dickson

The following cards are available for sale for $55 each [plus shipping - see below]

Richard Egan 
Frank LaPorte

Shipping:

Orders under $150 = $5 shipping
Orders over $150 = $7 shipping


If you want to purchase any of these cards:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding the card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
